tool_description: Get data for OVO, GOPAY, SHOPEE, LINKAJA, DANA, KasPro, i.Saku, DOKU
name: Check ID OVO, GOPAY, SHOPEE, LINKAJA, DANA
title: Check ID OVO, GOPAY, SHOPEE, LINKAJA, DANA
tool_name: Check ID OVO, GOPAY, SHOPEE, LINKAJA, DANA

api_list.name: Get ShopeePay Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://check-id-ovo-gopay-shopee-linkaja-dana.p.rapidapi.com/cek_ewallet/081357645086/shopeepay"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-id-ovo-gopay-shopee-linkaja-dana.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://check-id-ovo-gopay-shopee-linkaja-dana.p.rapidapi.com/cek_ewallet/{id}/shopeepay"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-id-ovo-gopay-shopee-linkaja-dana.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
